targets.rawSql:
SELECT imagen
	FROM lista.imagen
	where id = 1

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
			where f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
			and a.id_estatus in (6)

SELECT imagen
	FROM lista.imagen
	where id = 1

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	  inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where
    b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) 
    AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

select 
(SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	  inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where
    b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) 
    AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
    and a.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) )
-
(SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and
	f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true 
	and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')) as total

SELECT
(SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) 
)
-
(SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')) as total

select 
(SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8) )
-
(SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')) as total

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and
	f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true 
	and a.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

panels.title: TOTAL CASOS ATENDIDOS 1X10 DEL BUEN GOBIERNO

targets.rawSql:
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4)
										   		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												  and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16) and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
										   		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												  and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16) and b.principal is true 
												  and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
										   	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16)
												and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')
SELECT

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
	where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true	and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (353)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (361)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (406)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (359)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (369)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (357)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17)
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
SELECT

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id	
											inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
											inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
											inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia											
                      where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
											and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                      and b.principal is true and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	and b.principal is true	and a.id_estatus in (6) 
	and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                           inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                                           inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
                                           and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (371,374,404)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
                                           inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                           inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                                           inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (353)
                                           and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (353)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

                                            FROM gestion.caso a

                                            inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio

                                            where b.id_resolutorio in (361)
                                            and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                            and b.principal is true
                                            and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal,2) as porcentaje

inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado

                                              FROM gestion.caso a

                                              inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio

FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (357)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and a.id_estatus in (6)

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
												inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                        inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                        inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
												and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17)
												and b.principal is true
												and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
    inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
    inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
												inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                        inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                        inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
												and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
												and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17)
												and b.principal is true
												and a.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id

		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
    inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
    inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,16,17)
		and b.principal is true
		and a.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where b.id_resolutorio in (387,388,389,390,391,392,393,394,395,396,397,398,399,400,401,402,403,405,358) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  a.id
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
      inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
      inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia

			and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
			and b.principal is true
			and a.id_estatus in (6) 
			and a.feedback is not null

list.definition: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.estado where id < 26 order by id
list.label: Estado
list.name: estado
list.query: SELECT nombre FROM gestion.estado where id < 26 order by id

list.definition: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estado)
list.label: Municipio
list.name: municipio
list.query: SELECT a.nombre  FROM gestion.municipio a inner join gestion.estado b on a.id_estado = b.id where  b.nombre in ($estado)

list.definition:
SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.parroquia a 
	inner join gestion.municipio b on a.id_municipio = b.id 
	inner join gestion.estado c on c.id = b.id_estado
	where  c.nombre in ($estado)  and b.nombre in ($municipio)
list.label: Parroquia
list.name: parroquia
list.query:
SELECT a.nombre FROM gestion.parroquia a 
	inner join gestion.municipio b on a.id_municipio = b.id 
	inner join gestion.estado c on c.id = b.id_estado
	where  c.nombre in ($estado)  and b.nombre in ($municipio)
